name: LORE AI
description: LORE fills the critical gap in the Solana memecoin ecosystemâ€”serving as the essential bridge between PumpFun graduation and moonshot potential. When tokens earn PumpFun's "seal of approval," they face their greatest challenge: navigating the volatile market without the automatic visibility of launch platforms. While pre-graduation tokens benefit from extensive "free marketing" through DEX interfaces, Telegram bots, and trading communities, this promotional ecosystem often goes quiet after graduation. LORE answers the question every holder asks: "We've graduated... what now?"
